tossup_question: 7) EARTH AND SPACE  What basic force of the universe is most responsible for holding the planets of our solar system in their orbits?
bonus_question: 7) EARTH AND SPACE  What are the proper names of the 5 celestial bodies called wanderers by Greek astronomers because they had unusual paths in the sky throughout the year?
bonus_answer: ANSWER: MERCURY; VENUS; MARS; JUPITER; SATURN (in any order)
